com.siperian.sif.message.mrm

Class GetTaskLineageRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.sif.message.SiperianRequest
      • com.siperian.sif.message.mrm.GetTaskLineageRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class GetTaskLineageRequest
extends SiperianRequest

    Retrieves a list of tasks belonging to a user, group, or role. The list can be filtered by due date, priority, and status.

    Optional Parameters:
    • task id - Sets the rowid of the task to get lineage for.
    • owner - Sets the UID of user to which the tasks belong.
    • workflowStatus - Sets the the status of the workflow process to include.
    • taskPosition - Sets the position of the tasks to retrieve.

    Parameter combinations

    1. Get closed tasks for a specified user
      1. taskId = null
      2. ownerUid = userﾃ不 UID
      3. workflowStatus = ANY
      4. taskPosition = USER
    2. Get closed tasks for a specified user that are part of an active workflow process
      1. taskId = null
      2. ownerUid = userﾃ不 UID
      3. workflowStatus = OPEN
      4. taskPosition = USER
    3. Get closed tasks for a specified user that are part of a completed workflow process
      1. taskId = null
      2. ownerUid = userﾃ不 UID
      3. workflowStatus = CLOSED
      4. taskPosition = USER
    4. Get open tasks that have a task in their lineage (past) that is owned by the specified user.
      1. taskId = null
      2. ownerUid = userﾃ不 UID
      3. workflowStatus = OPEN
      4. taskPosition = WORKFLOW
    5. Get lineage for a specific task
      1. taskId = ID of task to retrieve lineage for
      2. ownerUid = [ignored]
      3. workflowStatus = [ignored]
      4. taskPosition = [ignored]
    Usage Example: The following example retrieves a list of Tasks that are assigned to user siftester and overdue.
    GetTaskLineageRequest request = new GetTaskLineageRequest();
    request.setOwner("siftester");
    GetTaskLineageResponse response = (GetTaskLineageResponse) sipClient.process(request);
    See Also:
    GetTasksRequest, CreateTaskRequest, UpdateTaskRequest, GetTaskLineageResponse, Serialized Form

    API Pair: GetTaskLineageResponse

    API Group: Task

        public void setSortCriteria(String sortCriteria)
        Criteria for ordering results. A comma-separated string containing names of fields in the package used to return the search data. The direction of sort may also be specified using ASC for ascending and DESC for descending. This is the same as in the ORDER BY clause of a SQL query.

        For example: "LAST_NAME ASC, FIRST_NAME ASC"

        Parameters:
        sortCriteria - Comma separated list of column names.

        public void setFirstRecord(int firstRecord)
        Index of first record to return, starting with 1. The API will return an error if this parameter is set to a negative value or 0. The API will return no records if the first record parameter is set to a value greater than the number of records returned by the original request.

        Parameters:
        firstRecord - Index of first record to return, starting with 1.

      • setReturnTotal

        public void setReturnTotal(boolean returnTotal)
        Sets whether to calculate the total number of rows satisfying the search criteria. Setting this parameter to true may have significant performance implications. Calculating the total number of records satisfying the search criteria requires execution of an extra (potentially) expensive query.

        Parameters:
        returnTotal - True - Calculate the total number of records satisfying the search criteria.

      • getWorkflowStatusEnum

        public TaskStatusEnum getWorkflowStatusEnum()
        See corresponding setter method for details.

        Returns:
        The status of the workflow processes to include in the lineage results.

      • setWorkflowStatusEnum

        public void setWorkflowStatusEnum(TaskStatusEnum workflowStatus)
        When retrieving lineage information. The processor checks the status of the workflow process and only includes lineage information for tasks that are part of workflow processes with the specified status.
        Parameters:
        workflowStatus - The status of the workflow processes to include in the lineage results.

      • getTaskPositionEnum

        public TaskPositionEnum getTaskPositionEnum()
        See corresponding setter method for details.

        Returns:
        The position of the task to include in the lineage results..

      • setTaskPositionEnum

        public void setTaskPositionEnum(TaskPositionEnum taskPosition)
        This parameter specifies which task to include in the results from the lineage. When the value is USER, the task assigned to the specified user is included. When the value is WORKFLOW, the task that is currently active in the workflow process is returned.
        Parameters:
        taskPosition - The position of the task to include in the lineage results..
